Description: Up today we have a killer B.C. Rich Kerry King Signature V 2. These are extremely rare and hard to find as they were only made for a short time. These models feature the Kahler Trem as Kerry and Jeff Favored the Kahler over the Floyd Rose. Trem is super smooth to use and works great. Also features a fast 24 fret neck, ebony finger board and a set of hot active pickups. Guitar looks, plays and sounds killer! For more info, please review the condition description and pics. Have any questions, feel free to ask! :) Please ask any and all questions, prior to purchasing. **Sold as is, no returns** item has been described accurately. No case or bag, but will be packaged extremely well for safe shipping. With proper shipping materials. Ships insured with tracking and signature confirmation. Please do not agree to buy if you do not plan to pay.
Title: B.C. Rich Kerry King Signature V 2 Tribal 6 String Electric Guitar w/Kahler Trem
ConditionDescription: In excellent used condition. The back plate of one of the tuners is missing. This doesn't effect the tuner and it works fine. There is some light buckle rash on the back near the bottom edge. There is one blemish on the side of the guitar, that fortunately, blends in the the designs of the guitar. It isn't noticeable unless you look for it. Other than that, the guitar is in excellent used condition. Electronics tested and working. Neck is good and straight. Frets are in excellent condition. Awesome player!!!
